website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful piece of furniture with quality craftsmanship – but if it's too large and elaborate for your needs, choose the Sturfurhome instead.
pros: An ideal choice for large bathrooms – 72-inch length in a spacious 2-sink design
Has a natural stone top and white oak finish
cons: It's large and pricey, and won't work for small spaces
The fancy design isn't for everyone

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is whiter than it looks in the picture. It is beautiful and great quality. We were very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Henry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous piece, exactly what i wanted for my remodeled master bath. Good quality,heavy product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First one was broke, but they expedited a new one..
customer_reviews.author: Scott arbir

customer_reviews.title: It’s a long time to wait to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The colors in the pictures are very different than the cow what it actually is. The white vanity sinks are correct but in the picture the rest of the cabinet appears much more antique or cream colored. It is stark white if color does not matter it seems OK well not work for me It’s a long time to wait to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miles

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product is questionable
customer_reviews.text: There are stains that will not come off the surface and it’s from face soap, regular hand soap. I bought this piece for our master bath
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Received it and it broke on multiple places on the top. Completely worthless now
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This piece is gorgeous. The color is more white but has a nice antiquesh look. Been looking for awhile and very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Pura vida

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful every citizen
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vanity for a master bath in a 150 year old house we have been renovatingl,And this is perfect,Just didn't expect it to be so white,but over all I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mybell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and excepted, well built very pretty...
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vanity .. Creme color lightly distressed . Love the shelves in the vanity where the bigger doors are . Plenty of room .
customer_reviews.author: Tim Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Just love the high quality of this unit .very well packaged,on time delivery, can't ask for more was a thousand dollars more in the retail store!
customer_reviews.author: MAKE AMERICA GREAT

customer_reviews.title: Color is more white with black / gray  antiquing
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! More white color with a gray/ black antiquing ... in the photo it looks off-white but it’s not it is very white . Worked out beautifully. And shipped in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: This Vanity is beautiful and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This Vanity is beautiful and very good quality. I highly recommend for price and quality as it is not a cheap presswood vanity.
customer_reviews.author: sheila coats

customer_reviews.title: My favorite I just love it and get plenty of compliments
customer_reviews.text: My favorite I just love it and get plenty of compliments. If I every remodel again I would diffidently buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimaree

product_meta.title: Silkroad Exclusive Countertop Marble Stone Double Sink Bathroom Vanity with Cabinet, 72", Cream
product_meta.description: Bring appeal to your bathroom with this elegant Empire style double sink vanity. This bright and charming traditional piece features our rich White Oak wood finish, ample storage room for you to organize all of your bathroom necessities & accessories, complementary Antique Brass handles, our natural Cream Marfil Marble Stone Counter top with holes pre-drilled (3 per sink) to accommodate any standard 8-inch widespread faucet of your choice, Spanish scroll feet to support the sturdy frame and beautiful carvings throughout the cabinet to accentuate the steadfast profile.
feature_bullets: Traditional Bathroom Vanity Double Sink Cabinet with White Oak Finish
Item comes with Cream Marfil Marble Stone Top and White Ceramic Sink
Material: Natural Stone Top, Solid Wood Structure & CARB Ph2 Certified Panels
Item Comes Fully Assembled and Pre-drilled for 8" Widespread Faucet - Faucet NOT included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars21 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
